about.title: About Me
about.description1: My name is Derlin R. Valera. I am a Software Engineering student passionate about backend development and software architecture. I work with Java, Spring Boot, and microservices design, with experience in scalable APIs, Spring Cloud, JWT authentication, and PostgreSQL. Basic knowledge of Docker and deployment. I am seeking to start in backend roles to continue learning about cloud computing, microservices development, and DevOps.

project1.name: Blog Platform API
project1.description: Backend platform for personal blogs developed with Spring Boot and microservices architecture. Includes JWT authentication, API Gateway, and management of users, posts, and comments.

project2.name: File Management API
project2.description: This project is a RESTful service developed with Spring Boot that allows uploading, downloading, listing, deleting files, and creating folders within a configurable root directory. It is useful for systems requiring basic server-side file management.

project3.name: E-Commerce Platform API // IN DEVELOPMENT
project3.description: RESTful API for an e-commerce platform.
